fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm node public endpoint is no longer exposed
fields.request_details: Log into any environment with multiple nodes configured. Pick a node with a known public endpoint slug (e.g. from the Nodes changelist) and attempt to visit /nodes/<slug>/ while authenticated. The request should return a 404 or redirect to login rather than exposing node metadata. Also confirm that posting to the same path fails. Record the node slug and HTTP responses in the ticket.
